classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on generative AI models, particularly LLMs and RAG. It highlights core GenAI engineer responsibilities like integrating GPT-4 with RAG, building AI features with generative AI, and crafting AI-driven summaries, aligning perfectly with the profile's definition.
